name: Ahmer Mashhadi - A freelance writer and software developer.
body:
# Ahmer Mashhaddi

## A Little Bit About Me
I am a freelance software developer and a content writer. I live in Karachi, Pakistan, where I am studying software eningeering as a major, although I love to learn everything in the world. This is my personal site, where I will host my opinions and information about my projects. Stay tuned for more!

## Contact
